name: Substrate acceptable - free of dust and construction waste
Apply specified adhesive and lay flooring
Vinyl skirting laps 150mm onto the wall lining
Minimum 10mm perimeter gap between flooring and wall
Coving bead and capping installed to vinyl coving
Trim bar finish applied to carpet to vinyl transition areas
Clean finished surface - Completed to specification
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
